name: Plitka Match
description:
How to play

Plitka Match has few simple rules:

  1. You have to place all available tiles on the board
  2. Tiles can go next to each other if they share at least a trait (background color, geometric shape, shape color or number)
  3. Tiles can't go next to each of other if they have exactly the same traits
Features
  • 20 levels
  • Mouse/touch controls
  • Around 1 hour of gameplay
